channel.description: A collection of Radio shows and Mixes from cheap|biscuit & Shivoo resident, Steve Gibson. Ranging from beats driven Hip Hop, Broken Beats & Latin through to Funk infused Soul, Jazz, Disco & House. The monthly radio shows run for about 30 minutes and cover a wide range of musical styles while the Ro'clectrovert mixes last for closer to an hour, are made up of the tunes I play in clubs and will be posted every 3 or 4 months.
channel.itunes:author: Steve Gibson
channel.itunes:summary: A collection of Radio shows and Mixes from cheap|biscuit & Shivoo resident, Steve Gibson. Ranging from beats driven Hip Hop, Broken Beats & Latin through to Funk infused Soul, Jazz, Disco & House. The monthly radio shows run for about 30 minutes and cover a wide range of musical styles while the Ro'clectrovert mixes last for closer to an hour, are made up of the tunes I play in clubs and will be posted every 3 or 4 months.

item.title: Afro in the bag, 35 Minute Mix...
item.description:
Quick AfroFunk/Latin/Broken mix while the rays are still out!!
Tracklisting:
1. Azaxx - Fiesta Tropical 2. Flevans - Begin Again 3. Crate Expectations - unknown track 3 4. Quantic Soul Orchestra - Take your time, change your mind 5. Diesler - El Coco 6. Cleon - Jaylis & Family 7. Jazztronik - Cannibal Rock
Next stop.. Ibiza, I'm spinning @ Eden on Tuesday 14th July if anyone is about. I'll be in the Shivoo room for the Reclaim the Dancefloor night!
Much Love to all and enjoy the sun!! :D

item.title: Ro'clectrovert: Vol5
item.description: So I know this is a bit early for my 60 min mix but I had been meaning to do a soulful hip-hop mix for ages and not got round to it. So here it is... finally. I didn't spend any time programming this. It's pure live, on the fly. You can probably tell by a couple of the mixes! ha ha... There's a bit of old stuff and a bit of new in there to keep everyone happy! Peas... Mixed 12th March 2009 Ro'clectrovert: Hip Hop Beats mix (Vol5) 1 TM Juke - Get it Together 2 Tribe Called Quest - Like it like That 3 Q-Tip feat. Norah Jones - Life is Better 4 Ugly Duckling - I Want to Believe 5 DJ Format - Now You 6 Jurassic 5 - Improvise 7 The Roots - I Don't Care 8 The Pharcyde - Runnin' 9 People under the Stairs - San Francisco Knights 10 Gangstarr - Rite Where You Stand 11 Dilated Peoples - Live on Stage 12 Brand Nubian - Brand Nubian 13 Lanu - It's Time 14 N*E*R*D - Run to the Sun 15 Mos Def - Habitat 16 Shuggy Otis - Strawberry Letter 23 drop me a mail: steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk

item.title: cheap|biscuit radio: Vol2
item.description: UPDATE: Tracklisting: Curtis Mayfield - Pusherman Ulticut - new song EPMD - you gots to chill Laura bettinson - kissed me The Meters - Cissy Strut Crazy Penis - Sun Science Big Daddy Kane - Aint no Half Stepping Welcome along to Volume 2 of the monthly radio show, February 2009. This month features some old school Hip-hop from the late 80's as well as some classic funk, another track from the local girl done good, Laura Bettinson (just been picked up by Coda Agency) and some info on upcoming DJ gigs. Send any feedback to steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk. track-listing to follow soon! Peas, Steve ;)
item.dc:creator: Steve Gibson
item.itunes:summary:
UPDATE:
Tracklisting:
Curtis Mayfield - Pusherman Ulticut - new song EPMD - you gots to chill Laura bettinson - kissed me The Meters - Cissy Strut Crazy Penis - Sun Science Big Daddy Kane - Aint no Half Stepping
Welcome along to Volume 2 of the monthly radio show, February 2009. This month features some old school Hip-hop from the late 80's as well as some classic funk, another track from the local girl done good, Laura Bettinson (just been picked up by Coda Agency) and some info on upcoming DJ gigs.
Send any feedback to steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk.
track-listing to follow soon!
Peas, Steve ;)

item.title: Ro'clectrovert: Vol4
item.description: Mixed using 2 x Pioneer CDJ1000's & DJM800 mixer 16th December 2008 1. Marc Hype & Jim Dunloop – Wah Wah Wah 2. Kokolo – Soul Power (Lack of Afro remix) 3. Nightmares on Wax – Da Feelin’ 4. Bebo Valdes – Ita Morreal (Chris Joss Funk remix extended) 5. Quantic & Mr Scruff – Giraffe Walk 6. Chicken Lips – Shoe Beast 7. Mr Confuse – Feel the Fire 8. Me & You – Sneaker Thief (Hint remix) 9. Mr Scruff w/ Andrea Triana – Get on Down 10. Idjut Boys - Whoktish 11. The Popular People’s Front – Loose in Lisboa 12. Flight of the Conchords – Think About it email: steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk web: www.mrstevegibson.com

item.title: cheap|biscuit radio: Vol1
item.description: Ola listeners, So I've been on about doing a proper podcast radio show for ages and never actually got around to doing it so here we are. Finally got the new Macbook I'd had my eye on and was astonished by how easy to use Garageband is for podcasts. :) Hopefully I will be doing this on a more regular basis. So here's just over 30 minutes of tunes and a tiny bit of chatter that I wouldn't normally get a chance to put in a mix.
item.dc:creator: Steve Gibson
item.itunes:summary:
Ola listeners, So I've been on about doing a proper podcast radio show for ages and never actually got around to doing it so here we are. Finally got the new Macbook I'd had my eye on and was astonished by how easy to use Garageband is for podcasts. :)
Hopefully I will be doing this on a more regular basis. So here's just over 30 minutes of tunes and a tiny bit of chatter that I wouldn't normally get a chance to put in a mix.

item.title: Ro'clectrovert: Vol3
item.description: The third in the series of Ro'clectrovert mixes. Mixed by Steve Gibson using 2 x Pioneer CDJ1000's & DJM600 mixer - 22nd December 2007 1.Unknown Artist - Stay Away From Me 2.Dusty Springfield - Spooky 3.DJ Format - Here Comes The Fuzz 4.Jurassic 5 - Lausd 5.Ugly Duckling - Friday Night 6.Elektrons - Get Up 7.Nostalgia 77 - The Garden 8.South City All Stars - South City All Stars vs. Pete Brown 9.INXS - Need You Tonight 10.Idjut Boys - Sweet Gerry Dynamite 11.Rug, Erik feat Dynamix of the Zulu Nation - Tribute (R'cr'ation mix) 12.The Heritage Orchestra - Skybreaks (Jazzanova remix) 13.Casbah 73 - El Trafico Jam 14.So T - Street Fight 15.Jackson Jones - I Feel Good (Put Your Pants On) email: steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk web: www.mrstevegibson.com

item.title: Ro'clectrovert: Vol2
item.description:
The second in the series of Ro'clectrovert mixes.
Mixed by Steve Gibson using 2 x Pioneer CDJ1000's & DJM600 mixer - 16th June 2007
1.Steve Gibson - cheap|biscuit intro 2.Jurassic 5 - I Am Somebody 3.People Under The Stairs - Code Check 4.Ugly Duckling - Everybody C'Mon 5.New Young Pony Club - Hiding on the Staircase 6.LCD Soundsystem- Losing My Edge 7.Herbie Hancock - Rock It 8.Chicken Lips - Without Sound 9.The Whitest Boy Alive- Golden Cage 10.Who Made Who - I Love 11.Chicken Lips - Sweet Cow 12.Tom Tom Club - Wordy Rappinghood 13.Roxy Music - Love is the Drug 14.Groove Armada - Get Down (Calvin Harris remix) 15. Ignition - Love is War (Dance City mix)
email: steve@cheapbiscuit.co.uk web: www.mrstevegibson.com
